sentences.english: When does the wedding come off [take place]?
sentences.chinese: 什么时候举行婚礼?

sentences.english: How many of you believe that there are meetings that take place without you?
sentences.chinese: 你们中多少人相信会有会议,在你们不在场时也会举行？

sentences.english: William and Kate, both 28, have so far revealed only that the wedding will take place in either the spring or summer next year with bookmakers tipping July and August as favorites.
sentences.chinese: 威廉和凯特今年都是28岁。迄今为止，两人只透露说婚礼将在明年春天或夏天举行。博彩公司认为七月或八月结婚的可能性较大。

sentences.english: her beauty and grace
sentences.chinese: 她的美貌和优雅风姿

sentences.english: an area of outstanding natural beauty
sentences.chinese: 一个自然风景极美的地区

sentences.english: Millions of dollars are spent each year on beauty products.
sentences.chinese: 每年都有上千万的钱花在美容产品上。

sentences.english: She was considered a great beauty in her youth.
sentences.chinese: 她年轻时被视为大美人。

detailed_translations.english: a quality that people, places, or things have that makes them very attractive to look at

sentences.english: every year at harvest time
sentences.chinese: 每年在收获的季节

sentences.english: Plum growers are expecting a bumper harvest this year.
sentences.chinese: 种植李树的农民期盼着今年有个好收成。

detailed_translations.english: the time when crops are gathered from the fields, or the act of gathering them
to gather crops from the fields

sentences.english: the lively New Year celebrations in the city centre
sentences.chinese: 市中心热闹的新年庆祝活动

detailed_translations.english: an occasion or party when you celebrate something

sentences.english: The hunters stalked their prey.
sentences.chinese: 猎人们隐伏跟踪猎物。

detailed_translations.english: a person who hunts wild animals, or an animal that hunts other animals for food

sentences.english: Thousands of people will starve if food doesn’t reach the city.
sentences.chinese: 如果食品不能运到那座城市，成千上万的人就要饿死。

sentences.english: pictures of starving children
sentences.chinese: 饥饿儿童的照片

sentences.english: They’ll either die from the cold or starve to death (= die from lack of food ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们要么会冻死，要么会饿死。

detailed_translations.english: to suffer or die because you do not have enough to eat

sentences.english: The tradition has its origins in the Middle Ages.
sentences.chinese: 这一传统源于中世纪。

sentences.english: old folk tales of unknown origin
sentences.chinese: 起源不明的古老民间传说

detailed_translations.chinese: 起源， 起因； 出身， 血统
detailed_translations.english: the place or situation in which something begins to exist

name: religious
trans: 宗教上的；信奉宗教的；虔诚的

sentences.english: I don’t share her religious beliefs .
sentences.chinese: 她的宗教信仰和我的不同。

sentences.english: a religious school
sentences.chinese: 宗教学校

sentences.english: the dates of major religious observances such as Easter or Christmas
sentences.chinese: 复活节和圣诞节等重要宗教节日的日期

detailed_translations.chinese: 宗教的； 笃信宗教的， 虔诚的
detailed_translations.english: relating to religion in general or to a particular religion

sentences.english: heavy seasonal rains
sentences.chinese: 季节性的大雨

detailed_translations.chinese: 季节的；周期性的；依照季节的
detailed_translations.english: happening, expected, or needed during a particular season

sentences.english: My ancestors were French.
sentences.chinese: 我的祖先是法国人。

detailed_translations.english: a member of your family who lived a long time ago

sentences.english: Obon has a family-reunion element, as the Japanese will return to their ancestral homes to be reunited with relatives living and deceased.
sentences.chinese: 因为在节日期间，日本人会回到祖籍和那些活着及死去的亲属团聚，盂兰盆节也有了家庭团聚的因素。

sentences.english: We were warned that it might not be the spiritual journey it once was and that we would be sharing it with many others – particularly during the Obon holiday period.
sentences.chinese: 我们被告知，登山也许不像曾经的那样是一次精神旅程了，还有许多其他人会和我们一起登山，特别是在盂兰盆节期间。

sentences.english: Notice the kanji character for "big" on the hillside in the above photo. Reckon they would light it up during Obon or some other festival.
sentences.chinese: 看到上图山的一边刻了很大的“大”这个汉字吗？我们猜想在盂兰盆会或其他的日本传统节日中，可能会起火点燃这个部分吧？

sentences.english: Matthew’s life is in grave danger .
sentences.chinese: 马修的生命危在旦夕。

sentences.english: The report expressed grave concern over the technicians’ lack of training.
sentences.chinese: 报告中对技术人员缺乏培训深表忧虑。

sentences.english: I have grave doubts about his ability.
sentences.chinese: 我十分怀疑他的能力。

sentences.english: The situation is becoming very grave.
sentences.chinese: 形势变得非常严峻。

detailed_translations.english: grave problems, situations, or worries are very great or bad
the place in the ground where a dead body is buried
to cut, carve, sculpt, or engrave

sentences.english: a church filled with the smell of incense
sentences.chinese: 充满焚香气味的教堂

sentences.english: lighted incense sticks
sentences.chinese: 点燃的棒香

detailed_translations.english: a substance that has a pleasant smell when you burn it
to make someone very angry

sentences.english: She set up an educational fund in memory of her mother.
sentences.chinese: 她为了纪念她母亲而设立了一个教育基金会。

sentences.english: This museum was built in memory of the great writer -Lu Xun.
sentences.chinese: 这个博物馆是为了纪念伟大作家鲁迅而建造的。

sentences.english: That year, in memory of a famous politician, the citizen set up a memorial near the Medeiterranean.
sentences.chinese: 那年，为了纪念一名著名的政治家，市民在地中海附近建造了一座纪念碑。

detailed_translations.english: intended to show respect and remind people of sb who has died

sentences.english: We want to prove that in Mexico.
sentences.chinese: 我们要在墨西哥证明这一点。

sentences.english: The United States bounds on Mexico in the south.
sentences.chinese: 美国的南面与墨西哥接壤。

sentences.english: All but one of the deaths were in Mexico, the epicenter of the outbreak.
sentences.chinese: 除一人外，其他死亡患者都在疾病爆发的中心地墨西哥。

sentences.english: They feasted well into the afternoon on mutton and corn stew.
sentences.chinese: 他们尽情享用玉米炖羊肉，一直吃到下午。

detailed_translations.chinese: 尽情地吃， 宴饮； 参加宴会
detailed_translations.english: If you feast on a particular food, you eat a large amount of it with great enjoyment
a large meal where a lot of people celebrate a special occasion

sentences.english: Her husband was later treated for a fractured skull.
sentences.chinese: 她丈夫后来因颅骨碎裂而接受治疗。

detailed_translations.english: the bones of a person’s or animal’s head

sentences.english: The X-ray showed that the bone was broken in two places.
sentences.chinese: X光检查显示有两处骨折。

sentences.english: Amelia had inherited her mother’s good bone structure.
sentences.chinese: 阿梅莉亚遗传了母亲的优美骨架。

detailed_translations.english: one of the hard parts that together form the frame of a human, animal, or fish body

name: Halloween
trans: 万圣节前夕；诸圣日前夕

sentences.english: What should I be for Halloween?
sentences.chinese: 万圣节我该打扮成什么模样？

sentences.english: How should I prepare for Halloween night?
sentences.chinese: 在万圣节之夜我该如何准备？

sentences.english: It might be due to the Halloween weekend, but the above reminds me of the below image.
sentences.chinese: 可能是因为周末是万圣节的关系，上面的图片让我联想到了下面的画面。

detailed_translations.chinese: 万圣节前夕（指十月三十一日夜晚）
detailed_translations.english: the night of October 31st, which is now celebrated by children, who dress in costumes and go from house to house asking for sweets, especially in the US and Canada. In the past, people believed the souls of dead people appeared on Halloween.

sentences.english: a strong belief in God
sentences.chinese: 笃信上帝

sentences.english: When you get something wrong, it can shake your belief in yourself.
sentences.chinese: 如果有什么事情没做好，就会动摇你对自己的信心。

detailed_translations.english: the feeling that something is definitely true or definitely exists

sentences.english: You do not need to dress up for dinner.
sentences.chinese: 你不必为了晚宴盛装打扮。

sentences.english: I just love the fun of dressing up in another era's clothing.
sentences.chinese: 我就是喜欢穿另一个时代的服装，很好玩。

sentences.english: Politicians are happier to dress up their ruthless ambition as a necessary pursuit of the public good.
sentences.chinese: 政客们更乐于把自己的狼子野心粉饰成对公众利益的一种必要追求。

detailed_translations.english: If you dress up or dress yourself up, you put on different clothes, in order to make yourself look more formal than usual or to disguise yourself

sentences.english: Pretending he doesn’t remember is an old trick of his.
sentences.chinese: 假装不记得是他的老花招了。

sentences.english: He didn’t really lose his wallet - that’s just a trick.
sentences.chinese: 他并没有真的丢了钱包——这只是一个骗局。

sentences.english: The trick is to bend your knees as you catch the ball.
sentences.chinese: 诀窍是接球时要屈膝。

sentences.english: She knew she’d been tricked, but it was too late.
sentences.chinese: 她知道自己被骗了，但为时已晚。

detailed_translations.english: something you do in order to deceive someone
to deceive someone in order to get something from them or to make them do something

name: play a trick on
trans: 搞恶作剧; 开玩笑；诈骗

sentences.english: I guess they play a trick on the new employee every April first.
sentences.chinese: 我想每年的愚人节，同事都会戏弄一下新进员工吧。

detailed_translations.chinese: 搞恶作剧; 开玩笑；诈骗

sentences.english: He was a painter and poet.
sentences.chinese: 他是一位画家兼诗人。

detailed_translations.english: someone who writes poems

sentences.english: In 1968, Congress passed the Monday Holiday law, which moved Memorial Day, Columbus Day, Veterans Day and Washington’s Birthday from their original dates to Mondays.
sentences.chinese: 1968年，国会通过了星期一假期日法，这一法案将阵亡战士纪念日，哥伦布发现美洲纪念日，退伍军人节和华盛顿诞辰纪念日这些节日从原定日期都移到了周一。

sentences.english: Some of the largest paredes occur on  Columbus Day (the second Monday in October), Veterans Day (November 11), independence Day (July 4), and Labor Day (the first Monday in September).
sentences.chinese: 一些大型游行在哥伦布纪念日（10月的第二个星期一），退伍军人节（11月11日），独立日（7月4日），及劳动节（9月的第一个星期一）举行。

detailed_translations.english: Oct 12, a legal holiday in most states of the US: the date of Columbus' landing in the West Indies in 1492

sentences.english: Only the timely arrival of the police prevented the situation from becoming worse.
sentences.chinese: 警方及时赶到才阻止了事态恶化。

sentences.english: Traffic problems account for one third of late arrivals.
sentences.chinese: 迟到的人有三分之一是因为交通问题。

sentences.english: The first arrivals at the concert got the best seats.
sentences.chinese: 最早来到音乐会的人坐上了最好的座位。

detailed_translations.english: when someone or something arrives somewhere

name: Christopher Columbus
trans: 克利斯朵夫•哥伦布（意大利航海家）

sentences.english: But the real question for Christopher Columbus was: How do I best get to the West Indies?
sentences.chinese: 但对克里斯多夫·哥伦布而言，真正的问题是，我怎样才能最快到达西印度？

sentences.english: This may be the spot where Christopher Columbus rached America.
sentences.chinese: 这里也许是克里斯托弗.哥伦布到达美洲的地点.

detailed_translations.chinese: 克利斯朵夫•哥伦布（意大利航海家）

sentences.english: After gaining independence in 1957, it was renamed ‘Ghana’.
sentences.chinese: 1957年获得独立后，该国改名为“加纳”。

sentences.english: Carrie’s gained a lot of weight recently.
sentences.chinese: 卡丽的体重最近增加了很多。

sentences.english: The Democratic Party needed a net gain of only 20 votes.
sentences.chinese: 民主党只需要增20张选票。

detailed_translations.english: to obtain or achieve something you want or need

sentences.english: The country has made great advances since independence.
sentences.chinese: 该国自独立以来发展迅速。

detailed_translations.chinese: 独立； 自主； 自立
detailed_translations.english: political freedom from control by the government of another country

sentences.english: There are plans to split the corporation into a number of smaller independent companies.
sentences.chinese: 有计划要把这家大企业分割成一些独立的小公司。

sentences.english: an independent charity
sentences.chinese: 独立的慈善机构

sentences.english: small independent bookshops
sentences.chinese: 私营小书店

sentences.english: schools in the independent sector
sentences.chinese: 私立学校

detailed_translations.english: an independent organization is not owned or controlled by, or does not receive money from, another organization or the government

sentences.english: You two know each other, I gather.
sentences.chinese: 我想你们俩认识。

detailed_translations.english: to believe that something is true because of what you have seen or heard

sentences.english: More than 75% of the land is used for agriculture.
sentences.chinese: 75%以上的土地用于农耕。

detailed_translations.chinese: 农业；农耕；农业生产；农艺，农学
detailed_translations.english: the practice or science of farming

sentences.english: Farmers struggling for survival strip the forests for agricultural land.
sentences.chinese: 为生存而挣扎的农民们把森林伐光来作农业用地。

detailed_translations.english: Agricultural means involving or relating to agriculture

sentences.english: Moodie has been awarded a golf scholarship at the University of Hawaii.
sentences.chinese: 穆迪获授夏威夷大学高尔夫奖学金。

sentences.english: The movie has won a number of awards.
sentences.chinese: 该片获得了多个奖项。

detailed_translations.english: to officially give someone something such as a prize or money to reward them for something they have done
something such as a prize or money given to someone to reward them for something they have done

sentences.english: New drugs are producing remarkable results.
sentences.chinese: 新药正在产生显著的效果。

sentences.english: a rise in sea level produced by climatic change
sentences.chinese: 由气候变化引起的海平面升高

sentences.english: As a policy, it did not produce the desired effect.
sentences.chinese: 作为一项政策，它并未产生预期的效果。

sentences.english: a factory that produces microchips
sentences.chinese: 微芯片制造厂

sentences.english: He produced a letter from his pocket.
sentences.chinese: 他从口袋里掏出一封信来。

detailed_translations.english: to cause a particular result or effect

sentences.english: I heard a rooster crow.
sentences.chinese: 我听见雄鸡啼叫。

detailed_translations.english: a male chicken

sentences.english: I really admire the way she brings up those kids all on her own.
sentences.chinese: 我十分佩服她独力把那些孩子抚养大。

detailed_translations.english: to respect and like someone because they have done something that you think is good

name: energetic
trans: 充满活力的；精力充沛的；积极的

sentences.english: an energetic man
sentences.chinese: 精力旺盛的男子

sentences.english: an energetic drive to get more customers
sentences.chinese: 争取更多客户的十足干劲

detailed_translations.english: having or needing a lot of energy or determination

sentences.english: He was looking forward to working with the new manager.
sentences.chinese: 他很期待和新经理一起工作。

sentences.english: He now says that he's looking forward to increased trade after the war.
sentences.chinese: 他现在说他正期盼着战后的贸易增长。

detailed_translations.english: If you look forward to something that is going to happen, you want it to happen because you think you will enjoy it

name: carnival
trans: 狂欢节；（四旬斋前的）饮宴狂欢；嘉年华（会）

sentences.english: preparations for this year’s carnival
sentences.chinese: 今年狂欢节的准备工作

sentences.english: when it’s Carnival in Rio
sentences.chinese: 里约热内卢举行狂欢节的时候

sentences.english: a carnival atmosphere in the town
sentences.chinese: 城里的狂欢气氛

detailed_translations.chinese: 狂欢节，嘉年华会；饮宴狂欢
detailed_translations.english: a public event at which people play music, wear special clothes, and dance in the streets

sentences.english: studies of the lunar surface
sentences.chinese: 对月球表面的研究

sentences.english: a lunar eclipse
sentences.chinese: 月食

detailed_translations.english: relating to the Moon or to travel to the Moon

sentences.english: on Easter Sunday
sentences.chinese: 在复活节星期日

detailed_translations.english: a Christian holy day in March or April when Christians remember the death of Christ and his return to life

sentences.english: a victory parade
sentences.chinese: 胜利游行

sentences.english: the St Patrick’s Day parade
sentences.chinese: 圣帕特里克节庆祝游行

sentences.english: a military parade
sentences.chinese: 军事检阅

sentences.english: The marchers paraded peacefully through the capital.
sentences.chinese: 游行队伍有秩序地列队穿过首都。

detailed_translations.english: a public celebration when musical bands, brightly decorated vehicles etc move down the street
to walk or march together to celebrate or protest about something

sentences.english: The Yellow River rolls on day and night.
sentences.chinese: 黄河日日夜夜地奔腾不息。

detailed_translations.english: all the time; continuously

sentences.english: basic necessities such as food and clothing
sentences.chinese: 食物和衣服这类基本的生活必需品

sentences.english: She took only a few items of clothing.
sentences.chinese: 她只带了几件衣服。

detailed_translations.english: the clothes that people wear

sentences.english: the Christian religion
sentences.chinese: 基督教

sentences.english: the Christian church
sentences.chinese: 基督教会

sentences.english: a Christian minister
sentences.chinese: 基督教牧师

detailed_translations.english: related to Christianity

sentences.english: As a scientist,he disbelieves in Jesus.
sentences.chinese: 作为一名科学家，他不信耶稣。

sentences.english: What do you want with us, Jesus of Nazareth?
sentences.chinese: 拿撒勒的耶稣，我们与你有什么相干？

sentences.english: According to the Christian religion,Jesus Christ resurrected from death.
sentences.chinese: 根据基督教的说法，耶稣基督曾死而复生。

detailed_translations.english: Jesus or Jesus Christ is the name of the man who Christians believe was the son of God, and whose teachings are the basis of Christianity

sentences.english: a bunch of cherries
sentences.chinese: 一串樱桃

sentences.english: cherry pie
sentences.chinese: 樱桃馅饼

detailed_translations.english: a small round red or black fruit with a long thin stem and a stone in the middle

sentences.english: pale pink blossoms
sentences.chinese: 淡粉色的花朵

sentences.english: The cherry tree was covered in blossom.
sentences.chinese: 樱桃树花满枝头。

detailed_translations.english: a flower or the flowers on a tree or bush
if trees blossom, they produce flowers

sentences.english: The boy gabbled off the poem as though he neither understood nor enjoyed it.
sentences.chinese: 这个小男孩急促而漫不经心地朗诵着诗，他好像既不懂这首诗又不喜欢这首诗。

sentences.english: It is embarrassing to have someone looking over your shoulder while you're at work, as though you could not be trusted.
sentences.chinese: 你工作时有人严密监视着，好像你不可靠似的， 这真叫人难堪。

sentences.english: Now you can find your passion for exercise and have fun with your kids at the same time.
sentences.chinese: 现在你可以在拥有锻炼的热情的同时和孩子们享受快乐时光。

sentences.english: She was stopped at customs and questioned.
sentences.chinese: 她在海关被叫住接受问话。

sentences.english: It took ages to clear customs (= be allowed through customs ) but then we were out of the airport quite quickly.
sentences.chinese: 过海关花了很长时间，不过出机场倒是很快。

sentences.english: You won’t be able to take that through customs.
sentences.chinese: 你带着那东西过不了海关的。

detailed_translations.english: the place where your bags are checked for illegal goods when you go into a country

name: worldwide
trans: 遍及全世界的；世界性的

sentences.english: His books have sold more than 20 million copies worldwide.
sentences.chinese: 他的书在全世界卖出了两千多万本。

detailed_translations.english: If something exists or happens worldwide, it exists or happens throughout the world

sentences.english: When we think we see something, say like a small red rosebud, we think our friend will see the same rosebud, same shape, same size.
sentences.chinese: 当我们觉得我们看到了什么东西，比如说一个红色的小玫瑰花蕾，我们会觉得我们的朋友们看到的也是同样的玫瑰花蕾，同样的颜色，同样的大小。

detailed_translations.english: the flower of a rose before it opens

sentences.english: What a fool she had been to think that he would stay.
sentences.chinese: 她竟然那么傻，以为他会留下来。

sentences.english: Like a fool, I accepted straight away.
sentences.chinese: 我像个傻子，立刻就接受了。

sentences.english: You silly old fool !
sentences.chinese: 你这个大傻瓜！

sentences.english: Even art experts were fooled.
sentences.chinese: 连艺术品专家也被骗了。

detailed_translations.english: a stupid person or someone who has done something stupid
to trick someone into believing something that is not true

sentences.english: I’m afraid it’s become a matter of economic necessity.
sentences.chinese: 恐怕这已成了一个经济需求的问题。

detailed_translations.english: when something is necessary

sentences.english: He asked permission to leave the room.
sentences.chinese: 他请求离开房间的许可。

sentences.english: They cannot leave the country without permission.
sentences.chinese: 没有许可他们不得离开这个国家。

detailed_translations.english: the act of allowing sb to do sth, especially when this is done by sb in a position of authority

sentences.english: The data can be used to make useful economic predictions .
sentences.chinese: 这些数据可用于进行有用的经济预测。

detailed_translations.english: a statement about what you think is going to happen, or the act of making this statement

sentences.english: Their music will never go out of fashion (= stop being fashionable ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们的音乐永不过时。

sentences.english: Please leave the building in an orderly fashion.
sentences.chinese: 请大家有秩序地离开大楼。

sentences.english: Perhaps they could sit down and discuss things in a civilised fashion.
sentences.chinese: 也许他们可以坐下来心平气和地商量事情。

sentences.english: She will be working out her problems in her own fashion (= in the way that she usually does this ) .
sentences.chinese: 她会以自己的方式来解决她的问题。

detailed_translations.english: something that is popular or thought to be good at a particular time

sentences.english: In Trinidad, I proposed an Energy and Climate Partnership for the Americas.
sentences.chinese: 在特立尼达，我提出了美洲国家能源和气候合作计划。

sentences.english: In Trinidad and Tobago, it is using sport to address the issue of violence, and in Zambia it is providing education about HIV and AIDS.
sentences.chinese: 在特立尼达拉岛和多巴哥岛，它用运动来处理暴力问题，在赞比亚，它提供了艾滋病方面的教育。

sentences.english: No, she objects to Picton's role as governor of Trinidad, where he was accused of brutality in his administration of the colony and its slave-based economy.
sentences.chinese: 不，她反对皮克顿作为特立尼达统治者的角色，在那里，他被指控在其对殖民地和奴隶经济的统治期间的残暴罪行。

sentences.english: He sees that cancer is a world unto itself; that Carla is now part of this world; and that he is part of it, too.
sentences.chinese: 他认识到癌症就是一个自我施加的世界；卡拉现在就是这个世界的一部分了；而他自己也是这个世界的一部分。

sentences.english: SECRETARY CLINTON: Thank you so much, Carla, and thanks for your leadership in this undertaking as well as so much else.
sentences.chinese: 非常感谢，卡拉，谢谢你在这项事业和其他众多事务中发挥的领导作用。

sentences.english: "The unauthorized use of the image of Carla Bruni caused her moral and economic damage," a court in the island capital Saint Denis de la Reunion said on Thursday.
sentences.chinese: 在该岛首府圣丹尼斯日留尼汪的法院周四表示这代表了“未经授权使用卡拉布鲁尼的图片，在道德名誉和经济上对她造成的损失 ”。

sentences.english: Johann Hari is a writer for the Independent newspaper.
sentences.chinese: 约翰 • 哈里是《独立报》作家。

sentences.english: No Parking (= used on signs )
sentences.chinese: 禁止停车

sentences.english: a £45 parking fine
sentences.chinese: 45英镑的违章停车罚款

detailed_translations.english: the act of parking a car or other vehicle

sentences.english: If you drive to work, park at the far end of the parking lot.
sentences.chinese: 如果你开车上班，那么就将汽车泊在停车场的最远端。

sentences.english: They emerged from the darkness and gathered like pilgrims, lining up beneath floodlights in the parking lot.
sentences.chinese: 他们从暗处冒出，像朝圣者一样汇聚在一起，在停车场的强光灯下排队。

sentences.english: Sitting in our usual parking lot, I was holding my book, watching her over the top of it.
sentences.chinese: 我们像往常一样在那个停车场里坐着，我拿了本书，从书的上边向她望去。

detailed_translations.english: an open area for cars to park in

sentences.english: They finally turned up at nearly midnight.
sentences.chinese: 他们终于在近午夜时出现了。

sentences.english: Richard had turned up on Christmas Eve with Tony.
sentences.chinese: 理查德在圣诞前夜与托尼一起出现。

detailed_translations.english: If you say that someone or something turns up, you mean that they arrive unexpectedly or after you have been waiting a long time

sentences.english: I’m so sorry, I do apologize.
sentences.chinese: 非常对不起，我真心道歉。

detailed_translations.english: to tell someone that you are sorry that you have done something wrong

sentences.english: Many people drowned when the boat overturned.
sentences.chinese: 船翻后许多人淹死了。

sentences.english: Jane was drowned in the river.
sentences.chinese: 简在那条河里溺水身亡。

detailed_translations.english: to die from being under water for too long, or to kill someone in this way

sentences.english: There was a touch of sadness in his voice (= he sounded a little sad ) .
sentences.chinese: 他的声音里含着一丝悲伤。

sentences.english: His relief was tinged with sadness (= he also felt rather sad ) .
sentences.chinese: 他的欣慰中带着一丝哀伤。

detailed_translations.english: the state of feeling sad

sentences.english: The obvious way of reducing pollution is to use cars less.
sentences.chinese: 减少污染显而易见的办法就是少用汽车。

detailed_translations.english: easy to notice or understand

sentences.english: I'll just wipe the table.
sentences.chinese: 我只擦擦桌子。

detailed_translations.english: to remove liquid, dirt, or marks by wiping

name: weave
trans: (过去式 wove, 过去分词 woven)（使）迂回

sentences.chinese: 手织围巾

sentences.english: Only a few of the women still weave.
sentences.chinese: 只有数量很少的妇女还在编织。

sentences.english: traditional basket weaving
sentences.chinese: 传统的编篮技术

detailed_translations.chinese: 迂回行进；编织；编造，编纂
detailed_translations.english: to make cloth, a carpet, a basket etc by crossing threads or thin pieces under and over each other by hand or on a loom
the way in which a material is woven, and the pattern formed by this

sentences.english: Chobe is also renowned for its large herds of elephant and buffalo.
sentences.chinese: 乔贝还以其大群的大象和水牛而闻名。

sentences.english: It was Tom’s duty to herd the cows.
sentences.chinese: 汤姆的职责是放牛。

sentences.english: More of our children should be able to look up at night and see that the Milky Way is not just a candy bar .
sentences.chinese: 我们应该有更多的孩子能够仰望夜空，眼中所看到的银河不应仅仅只是（模糊的）“一条糖块”而已。

sentences.english: We live in a galaxy of other stars; the Milky Way is not merely a glowing cloud but what we have come to call a galaxy, an island universe.
sentences.chinese: 我们存在于由其它恒星组成的一个星系中，银河不再仅仅是一朵发光的云，而是必须被称作星系，它是一个岛宇宙。

sentences.english: Annihilating dark matter at the heart of the Milky Way could account for signals detected by two space telescopes, according to a pair of US physicists.
sentences.chinese: 据两位美国物理学家称，银河中心暗物质湮灭的这一设想，可以解释近年来两台空间望远镜探测到的信号。

detailed_translations.chinese: 鹊，喜鹊；饶舌的人；有收集零碎东西癖好的人
detailed_translations.english: a bird with black and white feathers and a long tail

detailed_translations.chinese: 鹊的；有收集癖的；斑驳的，混杂的

name: weep
trans: (过去式 wept, 过去分词 wept) 哭泣；流泪

sentences.english: James broke down and wept.
sentences.chinese: 詹姆斯控制不住感情，哭了起来。

sentences.english: He wept bitterly (= cried a lot ) when it was time for us to leave.
sentences.chinese: 我们要分别的时候他痛哭了一场。

detailed_translations.english: to cry, especially because you feel very sad

sentences.english: The radio announcer said it was nine o'clock.
sentences.chinese: 电台播音员报了9点。

detailed_translations.english: someone who gives information to people using a  loudspeaker  or  microphone  , especially at an airport or railway station

sentences.english: Nichols set off for his remote farmhouse in Connecticut.
sentences.chinese: 尼科尔斯启程前往他位于康涅狄格州的偏远农舍。

sentences.english: The president's envoy set off on another diplomatic trip.
sentences.chinese: 总统特使再次踏上外交之旅。

sentences.english: Any escape, once it's detected, sets off the alarm.
sentences.chinese: 逃跑一旦被侦察到，就会触发警报。

detailed_translations.english: When you set off, you start a journey

sentences.chinese: 是的，我会去那里的。 谢谢提醒。

sentences.chinese: 他记了几条，提醒自己要说些什么。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone remember something that they must do

name: forgive
trans: (过去式 forgave, 过去分词 forgiven) 原谅；饶恕

sentences.english: He didn’t look the sort of man to forgive and forget (= forgive someone and no longer think about it ) .

sentences.chinese: 改善饮食什么时候都不嫌晚。

sentences.english: I've been dieting ever since the birth of my fourth child.
sentences.chinese: 自从我第4个孩子出生以后，我就一直在节食。

If you are dieting, you eat special kinds of food or you eat less food than usual because you are trying to lose weight

sentences.english: As the sun sets over Tokyo, another case is about to reach its climax on a bridge across a spaghetti of railway lines.

sentences.english: Standing in the next room, in the middle of what looked like piles of concrete spaghetti, I began to feel overpowered.
sentences.chinese: 站在下一个房间里，在这一大堆看起来就像水泥做的意大利细面条中间，我真有点受不了了。

sentences.english: Comments: This prank was one of the first to ever to be pulled on television, and although it seems a little bit out there today, at the time spaghetti was considered a delicacy in the U. K.
sentences.chinese: 点评： 瑞士面条大丰收是第一个上电视的恶作剧，尽管该主意在今天看来仍然有点不足为道，但当时恶作剧中的主角“面条”成为了英国饭桌上的精美食物。

detailed_translations.english: a type of  pasta  in very long thin pieces, that is cooked in boiling water

sentences.english: Use a wrench to loosen the nut.
sentences.chinese: 用活动扳手将螺帽拧松。

sentences.chinese: 放松腹部肌肉，然后再绷紧。

sentences.chinese: 防护服

sentences.english: Sunscreen provides a protective layer against the sun’s harmful rays.
sentences.chinese: 防晒霜提供了一层抵挡阳光中有害光线的防护层。

detailed_translations.english: used or intended for protection

sentences.chinese: 烘豆

sentences.chinese: 把豆子浸泡一夜。

sentences.chinese: 芸豆

sentences.english: green beans
sentences.chinese: 青刀豆，四季豆

detailed_translations.english: a seed or a  pod (=  case containing seeds  )  , that comes from a climbing plant and is cooked as food. There are very many types of beans.

sentences.chinese: 烤鸡配豌豆胡萝卜

detailed_translations.english: a round green seed that is cooked and eaten as a vegetable, or the plant on which these seeds grow

sentences.english: I like to eat cucumber sandwiches.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢吃有黄瓜的三明治。

sentences.chinese: 吃点黄瓜吧。

sentences.english: The "gurkophone" is one of their classics, made from a hollowed cucumber , a pepper and a carrot.
sentences.chinese: 黄瓜管“是他们的经典乐器之一，那是用掏空的黄瓜、辣椒和胡萝卜做的。

sentences.english: Spinach and eggplant.
sentences.chinese: 菠菜和茄子。

sentences.english: I said, "it is eggplant, olives and tomatoes.
sentences.chinese: 我说， “这是茄子，橄榄和西红柿。

sentences.english: However, eggplant and capsicums should be stored open in the crisper as they sweat if stored in plastic bags.
sentences.chinese: 而茄子和辣椒应该敞开存放在新鲜蔬菜保存盒中，因为当它们存放在塑料袋里时会冒汗。

detailed_translations.english: a large vegetable with smooth purple skin

sentences.chinese: 盐和胡椒粉

to add pepper to food

sentences.chinese: 蘑菇汤

sentences.chinese: 那些男孩子把我们花园里的桃树抢摘光了。

sentences.english: The peach trees cast all their blossoms after the heavy rain.
sentences.chinese: 大雨过后，桃花全部落掉。

sentences.english: There are a few apple trees scattered among these peach trees.
sentences.chinese: 这片桃树中杂有几棵苹果树。

sentences.chinese: 柠檬是一种酸味水果。

sentences.english: Add in the lemon after mixing the flour and sugar.
sentences.chinese: 在面粉和糖混合之后倒入柠檬汁。

sentences.english: Or get together the eggs and lemon juice and make them, but you get the idea.
sentences.chinese: （就像将鸡蛋和柠檬原汁混合在一起并制作它们，但您得有想法）。

detailed_translations.english: pale yellow in colour
a fruit with a hard yellow skin and sour juice

sentences.chinese: 她把杯子在膝盖上放稳。

an instrument for weighing things, with two dishes that hang from a bar

sentences.english: "Chocolate in moderation can be a fun part of a balanced diet, as a treat, " the spokesperson said.
sentences.chinese: 这位发言人说，“适量食用巧克力可能作为享受，成为均衡饮食有趣的组成部分。”

sentences.english: While a multivitamin is a good addition to any balanced diet, individual supplements and vitamin pills may not be as well absorbed by the body as nutrients in foods.
sentences.chinese: 虽然多种维他命剂是对均衡饮食的有益补充，但人体对单独的补充剂和维他命片剂的吸收情况不如食物中的营养那么好。

sentences.english: McDonald's says its food can be part of a balanced diet.
sentences.chinese: 麦当劳说它的食物可以成为均衡饮食的一个部分。

sentences.english: On New Year's Eve we had a barbecue on the beach.
sentences.chinese: 除夕那天我们在海滩上举行了烧烤野餐。

sentences.chinese: …一条羊腿。

detailed_translations.english: small pieces of meat and vegetables cooked on a stick

sentences.english: Are you going to roast the chicken?
sentences.chinese: 这鸡你是准备烤的吗？

sentences.chinese: 烤肉的香味

sentences.english: We caught a rabbit and roasted it over an open fire.
sentences.chinese: 我们捉到一只兔子，放在火上烧烤。

roasted
a large piece of roasted meat

sentences.english: Give that pan a stir , will you?
sentences.chinese: 把那锅东西搅一搅，好吗？

detailed_translations.english: an act of stirring something

sentences.english: So when you fry, bake, grill, or roast potatoes you could be generating potentially harmful carcinogens.
sentences.chinese: 因此当你油炸、烘烤、烧烤或者炒土豆时，有可能会产生有害的致癌物。

detailed_translations.english: the young of various species of fish
to cook something in hot fat or oil, or to be cooked in hot fat or oil

sentences.english: We ate a Greek salad with cucumbers, tomatoes, loads of olives and seaweed; a stir-fry of vegetables with tofu and a miso and cashew sauce; and a mound of quinoa.
sentences.chinese: 我们就着希腊沙拉吃了黄瓜、土豆还有许多橄榄和海带；用蔬菜、豆腐配以日本豆面酱、腰果酱炒的菜；还有一堆奎奴亚藜。

detailed_translations.english: to cook small pieces of food quickly by moving them around continuously in very hot oil

sentences.chinese: 我意识到我本该告诉你这件事的。

detailed_translations.english: You use ought to have with a past participle to indicate that although it was best or correct for someone to do something in the past, they did not actually do it.

sentences.english: You really ought to quit smoking.
sentences.chinese: 你真的应该把烟戒了。

sentences.english: The company ought to be making changes in its marketing strategy.
sentences.chinese: 公司应该在营销策略上作出改变了。

sentences.english: What sort of crimes ought the police to concentrate on?
sentences.chinese: 警方应当集中打击哪一类罪案？

sentences.english: You were out enjoying yourself when you ought to have been studying.
sentences.chinese: 应该学习的时候你却在外面玩。

detailed_translations.english: used to say that someone should do something because it is the best or most sensible thing to do

sentences.chinese: 咸猪肉煎蛋

sentences.chinese: 一罐可乐

sentences.chinese: 他说，“如果你想减肥，那就把电视机关了，或者看一些无聊的节目。”

sentences.chinese: 身材苗条的年轻女子

sentences.english: a slim waist
sentences.chinese: 纤腰

detailed_translations.chinese: 苗条的；修长的；微小的；差的

to make yourself thinner by eating less, taking a lot of exercise etc

detailed_translations.chinese: (Slim)人名；(阿拉伯)萨利姆；(英、西)斯利姆

sentences.english: I opened the packet just to satisfy my curiosity .
sentences.chinese: 我打开包裹只是为了满足我的好奇心。

sentences.english: The news aroused a lot of curiosity among local people.
sentences.chinese: 这条消息在当地人中间引起了很大的好奇心。

sentences.chinese: 她出于好奇决定跟踪他。

sentences.chinese: 玛格丽特好奇地看着他。

sentences.chinese: 求知欲极强的一个男人

sentences.chinese: 我只是好奇地随便问了一下。

sentences.english: In humans, vitamin C deficiency causes scurvy, and can eventually cause death.

trans: 佛罗里达镇（位于密苏里州）佛罗里达州（美国州名）

sentences.english: Well, Florida, we are here to say, not this time.
sentences.chinese: 那么，佛罗里达，我们在这里说，这次不能如此。

sentences.chinese: 那是我生命中极其美好的一天，因为从此以后，我的家人决不会像童年的我那样住在大街上了——小时候，我逃离那个我备受虐待的佛罗里达孤儿院后，就住在大街上。

sentences.chinese: 我建议他在佛罗里达的海岸上安置一艘航空母舰或是一艘其它种类的大舰艇，进行同样的筛选。

sentences.chinese: 如果有人知道你是个天文学家，他们会很快向你询问关于这件事的一切。

sentences.chinese: 任何国家、任何大学的天文学家都可以递交申请，告诉我们他们想要使用这台望远镜做什么。

name: Big Bang
trans: 宇宙大爆炸；创世大爆炸

sentences.english: We have a lot of energy in a small space, like you did at the Big Bang.
sentences.chinese: 的确，正如像宇宙大爆炸一样，我们在一个小空间里面有巨大的能量。

sentences.english: A "quark-gluon plasma" can be created if the collisions are energetic enough, a state of matter that existed during the high-energy conditions just after the Big Bang.
sentences.chinese: 如果对撞的能量足够大，就可能制造出一种“夸克——胶子等离子体”，这是在宇宙大爆炸之后的高能环境下存在的一种物质状态。

detailed_translations.chinese: 宇宙大爆炸；创世大爆炸

sentences.chinese: 暴力犯罪的增多

sentences.chinese: 警方与示威者之间发生的暴力冲突

sentences.english: 31 people have been injured in violent incidents throughout the day.
sentences.chinese: 今天一天有31人在暴力事件中受伤。

sentences.english: The riots ended in the violent deaths of three teenagers.
sentences.chinese: 动乱以三名少年的惨死而告终。

detailed_translations.english: involving actions that are intended to injure or kill people, by hitting them, shooting them etc

sentences.english: She sheered off in time to avoid an accident.
sentences.chinese: 轮船及时转向，避免了一次事故。

sentences.english: The jet was descending steeply, but its pilot was able to pull it out just in time.
sentences.chinese: 这架喷气式飞机直线下降，但飞行员及时制止了飞机的俯冲。

sentences.english: In order to catch the train in time, he polished off two bowls of rice in 5 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 为了及时赶上火车， 他在5分钟内就把两碗饭狼吞虎咽地吃光了。

sentences.english: I dread to think what the carbon footprint must be like of moving that coal but we have no choice.
sentences.chinese: 我都不敢想象为了运这些煤产生了多少碳足迹，但我们没有选择。

sentences.english: By removing whales, sharks and large fish, we ve reduced the amount of carbon stored in these populations.
sentences.chinese: 由于猎杀鲸鱼，鲨鱼和大型鱼类，我们也就减少了碳在这些物种群的储存量。

sentences.english: Across the world, forests and the soil beneath them absorb about a quarter of all carbon emissions.
sentences.chinese: 纵观全球，森林与它们脚下的土壤能吸收大约碳排放总量的四分之一。

detailed_translations.english: a chemical substance that exists in a pure form as diamonds,  graphite  etc, or in an impure form as coal, petrol etc. It is a chemical  element  : symbol C

sentences.english: Well, we know nitrogen has what?
sentences.chinese: 对于氮气我们知道什么？

sentences.english: The plant requires nitrogen in order to make proteins.
sentences.chinese: 植物需要氮以便制造蛋白质。

sentences.english: All of these from the group one and two through the group five and six elements, but what about elements, what about molecules like hydrogen, or nitrogen, or maybe oxygen?
sentences.chinese: 所有的这些都是来自于第一主族和第二组主族,到第五主族和第六组主族的悬殊，那么元素呢，比如氢气，氮气或氧气那样的分子呢？

detailed_translations.english: a gas that has no colour or smell, and that forms most of the Earth’s air. It is a chemical element: symbol N

sentences.english: water vapour
sentences.chinese: 水蒸气

detailed_translations.english: a mass of very small drops of a liquid which float in the air, for example because the liquid has been heated

sentences.english: The hotel had a lovely relaxed atmosphere .
sentences.chinese: 那家宾馆的气氛轻松愉快。

sentences.english: The atmosphere at home was rather tense.
sentences.chinese: 家里的气氛很紧张。

sentences.english: They are both teachers. Otherwise they are quite unlike.
sentences.chinese: 他们两位都是教师；除此之外他们迥然不同。

sentences.english: Music is quite unlike any other art form.
sentences.chinese: 音乐与其他艺术形式迥然不同。

detailed_translations.english: not alike
completely different from a particular person or thing

sentences.english: We have to tackle the fundamental cause of the problem.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须解决问题的根本原因。

sentences.english: the fundamental principles of liberty and equality
sentences.chinese: 自由和平等这两个基本原则

detailed_translations.english: relating to the most basic and important parts of something

sentences.chinese: 敬请出席于周五举行的俱乐部会议。

detailed_translations.english: when someone or something is present in a particular place

sentences.english: Stir until the sugar dissolves.
sentences.chinese: 一直搅拌到糖溶解掉。

sentences.chinese: 吸烟的害处

sentences.chinese: 硫酸

sentences.english: a juicy apple with a slightly acid flavour
sentences.chinese: 一个多汁、略带酸味的苹果

sentences.english: I was expecting another of his acid remarks, but he remained silent.
sentences.chinese: 我等着他再说一句刻薄的话，但他不吭声了。

detailed_translations.english: a chemical substance that has a  pH  of less than 7. Strong acids can burn holes in material or damage your skin
having a sharp sour taste

sentences.english: ...a large supermarket chain.
sentences.chinese: …一家大型连锁超市。

detailed_translations.english: a number of shops, hotels, cinemas etc owned or managed by the same company or person

sentences.english: What was Jeff’s reaction when you told him about the job?
sentences.chinese: 你告诉杰夫这个工作时，他是什么反应？

sentences.english: Children will learn to multiply in the second grade.

detailed_translations.chinese: 乘；使增加；使繁殖；使相乘

sentences.english: The human brain needs to be without oxygen for only four minutes before permanent damage occurs.
sentences.chinese: 人脑缺氧只需4分钟就会造成永久性损伤。

sentences.english: Fish and shellfish are the specialties.

detailed_translations.chinese: 甲壳类动物；贝类等有壳的水生动物
detailed_translations.english: an animal that lives in water, has a shell, and can be eaten as food, for example  crab s  ,  lobster s  , and  oyster s

sentences.english: At first this amphibian deals with the cooler days by burying itself in the soil.
sentences.chinese: 起初，天气乍凉的时候，这种两栖动物将自己埋在土壤里。

sentences.english: Why does the speaker choose that amphibian as her representative of a public creature?
sentences.chinese: 诗人为何选择这个两栖动物作为公众人物的代表？

sentences.english: "Almost all of them were abandoned somewhere in the city, " said Wu Weichun, the director of the zoo's amphibian department, to the Shanghai Dailynewspaper.
sentences.chinese: “它们中几乎所有都是在城市里被遗弃的，”动物园两栖动物馆主任吴文春对《上海每日新闻报》说。

detailed_translations.english: an animal such as a  frog  that can live both on land and in water

sentences.english: Bird evolved from reptiles, so the first bird must have come out of an egg--laid by a reptile.
sentences.chinese: 禽类是由爬虫类进化而来，所以，第一只禽鸟肯定是从爬虫类孵化的蛋里出来的。

sentences.english: No matter how dry your skin gets, you will never turn into an alligator or any other type of reptile.
sentences.chinese: 不论皮肤多么干燥，你永远不会变成美洲鳄或任何其他一种皮肤粗糙的爬行动物。

sentences.english: This small reptile, which measures just 10 centimeters long, can swim through the sand dunes at up to 15 centimeters per second.
sentences.chinese: 这种身长只有10厘米小型爬行动物，可以在沙子中以最快每秒15厘米的速度游动。

detailed_translations.english: a type of animal, such as a snake or  lizard  , whose body temperature changes according to the temperature around it, and that usually lays eggs to have babies

sentences.english: It is one of only two mammals (the echidna is the other) that lay eggs.
sentences.chinese: 它是仅有的两种产蛋哺乳动物之一。

sentences.english: Occasionally, hens lay eggs with imperfect shells or without shells altogether.
sentences.chinese: 有时候，母鸡产蛋要么壳不完美要么干脆没有壳。

sentences.english: The most amazing (and badass) characteristic of the komodo dragon is that the female can lay eggs that hatch without being fertilized by a male (this is called parthenogenesis).
sentences.chinese: 而他们最令人叹为观止的特点是：科摩多巨蜥可以单性繁殖——即雌性科摩多巨蜥可以再未受精的情况下产蛋。

sentences.english: How then would this dinosaur have moved?
sentences.chinese: 那么这种恐龙要如何移动呢？

sentences.english: Like shark and dinosaur teeth they would break, but then regenerate.
sentences.chinese: 它们就像鲨鱼和恐龙的牙齿一样会断裂，但也会再生。

sentences.english: From there you can look straight down to the dinosaur fossils displayed on the floor below.
sentences.chinese: 从那儿往向下看，你可以看到陈列在地面上的恐龙化石。

sentences.chinese: 许多国家仍存在包办婚姻的习俗。

sentences.english: We existed on a diet of rice.
sentences.chinese: 我们靠吃大米过活。

sentences.chinese: 鲸是一种哺乳动物。

sentences.english: The whale is a mammal.
sentences.chinese: 鲸鱼是哺乳动物。

sentences.english: The problem with that theory is that no other mammal has resorted to this method of cooling down.
sentences.chinese: 这一理论的问题在于，没有其他的哺乳动物采取了这种降低体温的方式。

detailed_translations.english: a type of animal that drinks milk from its mother’s body when it is young. Humans, dogs, and whales are mammals.

sentences.english: I also believe that slactivism on an individual level will either diminish or give birth to more conscious and active participation in the work of making a difference.
sentences.chinese: 我还相信的是，处于个人层面的懒汉行动主义既不会减少也不会产生更多慈善意识或积极行动来改变现状。

sentences.english: When our mother gave birth to us, she never expected that we will give birth to her.
sentences.chinese: 我们的妈妈给予我们生命，决没有期望我们也给予她生命。

sentences.english: Most of the evidence was destroyed in the fire. Thus it would be almost impossible to prove him guilty.
sentences.chinese: 大多数证据已在大火中烧毁，因而要证明他有罪几乎是不可能的。

detailed_translations.english: as a result of something that you have just mentioned

sentences.english: carbon/sulphur dioxide
sentences.chinese: 二氧化碳／硫

detailed_translations.english: a chemical compound that contains two atoms of oxygen and one atom of another chemical element

sentences.english: How much carbon dioxide you save, if any, depends on how far you live from work and how you get there, among other things.
sentences.chinese: 如果真有的话，你可以节约多少二氧化碳？ 它取决于你住得有多远还是你如何完成目标抑或其他因素？

sentences.english: And then we have gas cooled reactors which can use supercritical carbon dioxide or helium.
sentences.chinese: 然后我们有气体冷却反应堆,那能使用超临界二氧化碳或者氦。

sentences.english: But as Solomon and colleagues suggest in a new study published in the Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences, it is not true for the most abundant greenhouse gas: carbon dioxide.
sentences.chinese: 但是，正如所罗门和他的同事提出的一项发表在《美国国家科学院院刊》的新研究表明，对最丰富的温室气体，二氧化碳，这是不正确的。

detailed_translations.english: the gas produced when animals breathe out, when carbon is burned in air, or when animal or vegetable substances decay

sentences.english: Nothing would prevent him from speaking out against injustice.
sentences.chinese: 什么都不能阻止他鸣不平。

sentences.english: The meaning of the poem has always been a puzzle.
sentences.chinese: 那首诗的含义始终是个谜。

sentences.english: He thought he had solved the puzzle.
sentences.chinese: 他认为他已经解开了那个谜。

sentences.english: What puzzles me is why his books are so popular.
sentences.chinese: 令我不解的是，他的书为什么如此受欢迎。

to confuse someone or make them feel slightly anxious because they do not understand something

sentences.english: a degree in biology
sentences.chinese: 生物学学位

detailed_translations.english: the scientific study of living things

sentences.english: Similarly, every time a biologist discovers a new species, there is the opportunity to honour someone or something.
sentences.chinese: 类似地，每次一位生物学家发现一个新物种，就又有了一个纪念某人或某事的机会。

sentences.english: One biologist developed a formula for how much genetic material would have to be to saved in the act of altruism for it to be worthwhile.
sentences.chinese: 一位生物学家发展了一套公式，用来计算到底有多少遗传物质可以被保留下来的时候，利他的行为才是值得的。

sentences.english: An evolutionary biologist would say physical activity is the only voluntary means you have of varying or regulating your energy expenditure.
sentences.chinese: 一个进化生物学家会说体力活动是唯一的志愿就是你的不同或管理您的能源开支的。

detailed_translations.english: someone who studies or works in biology

sentences.english: the force of gravity
sentences.chinese: 重力

sentences.english: I could not hide from her the gravity of the situation.
sentences.chinese: 我不能向她隐瞒情况的严重性。

sentences.english: the launch of a communications and weather satellite
sentences.chinese: 气象通信卫星的发射

detailed_translations.english: a machine that has been sent into space and goes around the Earth, moon etc, used for radio, television, and other electronic communication

sentences.english: Arthur was a very gentle, caring person.
sentences.chinese: 阿瑟是一个非常温柔体贴的人。

sentences.english: After a little gentle persuasion , she agreed to go back to her family.
sentences.chinese: 经过几句温和的劝说，她同意回到家里去。

sentences.english: He is also a geologist.
sentences.chinese: 他也是一位地质学家。

sentences.english: A senior Pakistani geologist says, however, that the trend could be due to large-scale irrigation schemes that began in the area at around the same time as the West's Industrial Revolution.
sentences.chinese: 然而，一位资深巴基斯坦地质学家说，这个趋势也可能是因为这个地区与西方工业革命同时开始的大规模的灌溉计划造成的。

sentences.english: Another geologist in the region, Yang Yong, also said he believes geological concerns likely played an important role in the decision.
sentences.chinese: 该地区另一位地质学家杨勇也说，他相信地质方面的考虑可能对推迟蓄水的决定起到了重要作用。

sentences.chinese: 一位核物理学家

detailed_translations.english: a scientist who has special knowledge and training in physics

sentences.english: He pulled down the shades, blocking out the bright sunlight.
sentences.chinese: 他拉下了窗帘，遮挡住强烈的阳光。

detailed_translations.english: Something that blocks out light prevents it from reaching a place

sentences.english: Dinosaurs have been extinct for millions of years.
sentences.chinese: 恐龙已灭绝数千万年了。

sentences.english: Pandas could become extinct in the wild.
sentences.chinese: 熊猫在野生环境中可能会绝种。

sentences.english: an extinct species
sentences.chinese: 已灭绝的一个物种

detailed_translations.english: (of a type of plant, animal, etc.) no longer in existence

sentences.english: Los Angeles’ warm dry climate
sentences.chinese: 洛杉矶温暖干燥的气候

detailed_translations.chinese: 气候； 风土， 地带； 风气， 气氛
detailed_translations.english: the typical weather conditions in a particular area

sentences.english: Halley’s comet
sentences.chinese: 哈雷彗星

detailed_translations.english: an object in space like a bright ball with a long tail, that moves around the sun

sentences.english: We watched the waves crashing against the rocks.
sentences.chinese: 我们看着海浪哗啦哗啦地冲击岩石。

sentences.english: The plates went crashing to the ground.
sentences.chinese: 盘子哗啦一声摔落到地上。

sentences.english: A large branch came crashing down .
sentences.chinese: 一根大树枝啪啦一声掉落下来。

detailed_translations.chinese: 倒下，坠落；发出撞击声；垮台，破产
detailed_translations.english: to hit something or someone extremely hard while moving, in a way that causes a lot of damage or makes a lot of noise
to have an accident in a car, plane etc by violently hitting something else
a sudden loud noise made by something falling, breaking etc

name: Isaac Newton
trans: 艾萨克•牛顿（英国科学家）

sentences.english: What Sir Isaac Newton was doing late at night may surprise you.
sentences.chinese: 在深夜艾萨克·牛顿先生做的事可能会令你感到惊奇。

sentences.english: Sir Isaac Newton supposedly discovered gravity through the fall of an apple.
sentences.chinese: 据称艾萨克·牛顿爵士通过苹果落地，发现了万有引力。

sentences.english: One of the most well known tenets of physics — for every action, there is an equal and opposite reaction — was first discovered by Isaac Newton.
sentences.chinese: 物理学最广为人知的一条定律——对任何一个动作而言，存在一个相同大小的反作用——由艾萨克·牛顿发现。

detailed_translations.chinese: 艾萨克•牛顿（英国科学家）

name: Albert Einstein
trans: 阿尔伯特•爱因斯坦（德裔美国科学家）

sentences.english: This could be done because of the way gravity bends light, as demonstrated by Albert Einstein.
sentences.chinese: 这所以能够这么做，是因为阿尔伯特·爱因斯坦已经证明了的重力弯曲光线的方式。

sentences.english: At the dawn of the nuclear age that he helped to unleash, Albert Einstein said: “Now everything has changed…” And he warned: “We are drifting towards a catastrophe beyond comparison.
sentences.chinese: 在他帮助开创的核时代来临之际，阿尔伯特·爱因斯坦说：“现在，一切都改变了……”。 他还警告说：“我们正在向一场无法比拟的灾难滑落。

sentences.english: Albert Einstein was able to conceive his theory of relativity because he thought that time and space might not be immutable.
sentences.chinese: 阿尔伯特·爱因斯坦能够演算出相对论，是因为他认为时间和空间不可能一成不变。

detailed_translations.chinese: 阿尔伯特•爱因斯坦（德裔美国科学家）

name: Stephen Hawking

detailed_translations.english: the act of finding the position of something

sentences.english: The environment is a popular topic these days.
sentences.chinese: 如今环境是一个热门话题。

sentences.english: The main topic for discussion will be the proposed new supermarket.
sentences.chinese: 讨论的主要议题是拟建中的超级市场。

sentences.english: a wide range of topics
sentences.chinese: 广泛的话题

detailed_translations.chinese: 题目， 论题， 话题
detailed_translations.english: a subject that people talk or write about

sentences.english: Oil and water don’t mix.
sentences.chinese: 油和水不相融。

detailed_translations.english: if you mix two or more substances or if they mix, they combine to become a single substance, and they cannot be easily separated

sentences.english: The town is a mixture of the old and the new.
sentences.chinese: 这个小城新旧结合。

detailed_translations.english: a combination of two or more different things, feelings, or types of people

sentences.english: a rose bush
sentences.chinese: 玫瑰丛

sentences.english: The child was hiding in the bushes.
sentences.chinese: 那孩子躲在灌木丛里。

detailed_translations.english: a plant with many thin branches growing up from the ground

detailed_translations.chinese: 以灌木装饰；使…精疲力竭
如灌木般长得低矮的；粗野的

sentences.english: ...a solid maple worktop.
sentences.chinese: …一张结实的枫木工作台。

detailed_translations.english: a tree which grows mainly in northern countries such as Canada. Its leaves have five points and turn red or gold in autumn.

sentences.english: the risk of frost damage to crops
sentences.chinese: 庄稼遭受霜冻灾害的危险

detailed_translations.english: very cold weather, when water freezes
to cover a cake with a mixture of powdery sugar and liquid

sentences.english: New evidence has confirmed the first witness’s story.
sentences.chinese: 新的证据证实了第一个证人的说法。

sentences.english: To confirm my diagnosis I need to do some tests.
sentences.chinese: 为了证实我的诊断，我要做一些化验。

sentences.english: Could you confirm the dates we discussed?
sentences.chinese: 你能确认我们商讨过的日期吗？

sentences.english: After a six-month probationary period, her position was confirmed.
sentences.chinese: 经过六个月的试用期后，她获准正式担任该职。

detailed_translations.english: to state or show that sth is definitely true or correct, especially by providing evidence

sentences.english: the wealthy nations of the world
sentences.chinese: 世界上的富国

detailed_translations.english: having a lot of money, possessions etc

sentences.english: Measure the distance between the two points.
sentences.chinese: 量出两点之间的距离。

sentences.english: The cottage is some distance (= quite a long distance ) from the road.
sentences.chinese: 小屋离开大路有些距离。

sentences.english: Church bells rang in the distance (= they were far away ) .
sentences.chinese: 远处教堂的钟声响起。

detailed_translations.english: the amount of space between two places or things

sentences.english: The sound of the car died away in the distance.
sentences.chinese: 小轿车发出的噪音消逝在远处。

sentences.english: From Bugues, you could see her head rising in the distance, above the hedge of medlar trees that separated our land from that of her children.
sentences.chinese: 从比格，你可以看到她的头在远处欧楂果树的篱笆墙上露出来，篱笆墙把我们的土地跟她子女家的隔离开来。

detailed_translations.english: far away but still able to be seen or heard

sentences.english: We could just see the outline of the house through the mist.
sentences.chinese: 薄雾中我们只能看到房子的轮廓。

sentences.english: He vanished into the mist.
sentences.chinese: 他消失在雾中。

sentences.english: The hills were shrouded in mist (= covered in mist, so that you could not see them ) .
sentences.chinese: 山峦笼罩在雾霭之中。

sentences.english: The mist came down off the mountains.
sentences.chinese: 雾从山上飘下来。

sentences.english: The mists rolled in off the sea (= came on to the land from the sea ) .
sentences.chinese: 雾气从海上涌来。

detailed_translations.chinese: 薄雾；视线模糊不清；模糊不清之物
detailed_translations.english: a light cloud low over the ground that makes it difficult for you to see very far

sentences.english: a cold, misty morning
sentences.chinese: 一个雾蒙蒙的寒冷早晨

detailed_translations.english: misty weather is weather with a lot of mist

detailed_translations.chinese: (Misty)人名；(英)米斯蒂，米丝蒂(女名)；(法)米斯蒂

sentences.english: There a friendly captain pointed across the Niagara River.
sentences.chinese: 在那儿，一位友善的船长指着尼亚加拉河对岸。

sentences.english: Niagara belongs to the heavyweights - where a whole solid river plunges bodily over a cliff The real sight from above is the gigantic movement of the falls themselves， digging the gorge.
sentences.chinese: 尼亚加拉瀑布属于重量级——一股巨流全部从悬崖上冲泻下来。 从上往下看到的现实景像是瀑布自身的强烈运动在凿峡谷。

sentences.english: He started the magazine with a schoolmate.
sentences.chinese: 他和他的一个同学创办了那份杂志。

detailed_translations.english: someone who goes or went to the same school as you

name: booth
trans: 公用电话间；货摊；售货亭

sentences.english: I called her from a public phone booth near the entrance to the bar.
sentences.chinese: 我在酒吧入口附近的一个公用电话亭给她打了电话。

detailed_translations.english: A booth is a small area separated from a larger public area by screens or thin walls where, for example, people can make a telephone call or vote in private

sentences.english: By day he worked downtown for American Standard.
sentences.chinese: 白天，他在市中心为美国标准公司工作。

sentences.english: ...an office in downtown Chicago.
sentences.chinese: …芝加哥市中心的一间办公室。

sentences.english: ...in a large vacant area of the downtown.
sentences.chinese: …在市中心的一大块空地上。

detailed_translations.english: Downtown is also an adverb
Downtown places are in or toward the centre of a large town or city, where the stores and places of business are
Downtown is also a noun

sentences.english: a pearl necklace
sentences.chinese: 珍珠项链

sentences.english: {"GLOSS":["a necklace made of pearls"],"COLLOINEXA":["a string of pearls"]}
sentences.chinese: 一串珍珠

sentences.english: ...tiny pearl buttons.
sentences.chinese: …珍珠般的小扣子

detailed_translations.chinese: 珍珠；珍珠色；杰出者；珍品
detailed_translations.english: a small round white object that forms inside an  oyster  , and is a valuable jewel
Pearl is used to describe something that looks like a pearl
to set with or as if with pearls

name: Cantonese
trans: 广东人（的）；广州人（的）; 广东话（的）

detailed_translations.english: a Chinese language spoken in Southern China
Cantonese means belonging or relating to the city of Canton or Guangdong province

sentences.english: The journey took approximately seven hours.
sentences.chinese: 旅程大约花了七个小时。

detailed_translations.english: used to show that sth is almost, but not completely, accurate or correct

sentences.english: When dawn broke (= the first light of the day appeared ) , we were still 50 miles from Calcutta.
sentences.chinese: 破晓的时候，我们离加尔各答还有50英里。

sentences.english: I was up at the crack of dawn (= very early in the morning ) to get the plane.
sentences.chinese: 我一大早就起来赶飞机。

sentences.english: We worked from dawn to dusk (= through the whole day while it is light ) .
sentences.chinese: 我们从早干到晚。

sentences.english: the cold light of dawn
sentences.chinese: 清冷的晨曦

sentences.english: The morning dawned fresh and clear after the storm.
sentences.chinese: 暴风雨过后，破晓时天朗气清。

detailed_translations.english: the time at the beginning of the day when light first appears
if day or morning dawns, it begins

sentences.english: ...the difficulties facing women in the workplace.
sentences.chinese: …妇女在工作场所中面临的困难。

detailed_translations.english: the room, building etc where you work

sentences.english: a cold buffet
sentences.chinese: 冷餐会

detailed_translations.chinese: 自助餐；小卖部；打击；猛烈冲击
detailed_translations.english: a meal at a party or other occasion, in which people serve themselves at a table and then move away to eat
if something, especially wind, rain, or the sea, buffets something, it hits it with a lot of force

sentences.english: We went along a broad passage.
sentences.chinese: 我们走在一条宽阔的走廊上。

sentences.english: He was six feet tall, with broad shoulders.
sentences.chinese: 他身高六英尺，肩膀宽阔。

detailed_translations.english: a road, river, or part of someone’s body etc that is broad is wide

sentences.english: As they sat in a café looking over the broad St Lawrence River, a young man sat down with them.
sentences.chinese: 正当她们坐在咖啡馆里向外瞭望宽阔的圣劳伦斯河的时候，一个年轻人和他们坐到了一起。

sentences.english: The capital of Francophone Canada offers an annual Winter Carnival with snow sculptures, an Ice Palace and tower and a legendary canoe race along the St Lawrence River.
sentences.chinese: 雪雕，冰宫，冰塔都是冬季嘉年华上必不可少的项目。 还会有著名的圣劳伦斯河独木舟比赛。

sentences.english: Lucy was staying in the nearby town of Hamilton.
sentences.chinese: 露西当时住在附近的汉密尔顿镇。

sentences.english: He might easily have been seen by someone who lived nearby.
sentences.chinese: 他可能很容易被住在附近的人看到。

sentences.english: The helicopter crashed to earth nearby.
sentences.chinese: 直升机坠毁在附近的地面上。

detailed_translations.english: not far away
a short distance from sb/sth; not far away

sentences.english: the traditions of South East Asia
sentences.chinese: 东南亚的传统

sentences.english: the tradition that the eldest son inherits the property
sentences.chinese: 长子继承家产的传统

sentences.english: By tradition, it’s the bride’s parents who pay for the wedding.
sentences.chinese: 根据传统习俗，婚礼的费用由新娘的父母承担。

detailed_translations.english: a belief, custom, or way of doing something that has existed for a long time, or these beliefs, customs etc in general

sentences.english: Her husband’s violence terrified her.
sentences.chinese: 丈夫的暴力行为让她感到害怕。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone extremely afraid

sentences.english: a terrified little girl
sentences.chinese: 一个惊恐万分的小女孩

detailed_translations.english: very frightened

sentences.english: Your Dad will be so pleased.
sentences.chinese: 你爸爸会非常高兴的。

sentences.english: She seemed pleased by the compliment.
sentences.chinese: 她受了赞扬，显得很高兴。

detailed_translations.chinese: 高兴的；喜欢的；乐意做某事
detailed_translations.english: happy or satisfied

detailed_translations.chinese: 满意；愿意（please的过去分词形式）

sentences.english: Steve borrowed his dad’s sports car to impress his girlfriend.
sentences.chinese: 史蒂夫借来他爸爸的跑车向女友炫耀。

detailed_translations.english: to press something into a soft surface so that a mark or pattern appears on it

name: impressive
trans: 给人深刻印象的；感人的

sentences.english: The figures certainly look impressive.
sentences.chinese: 这些数字看上去确实很可观。

sentences.english: Among the guests was an impressive array of authors and critics.
sentences.chinese: 来宾中有不少出色的作家和评论家。

detailed_translations.english: something that is impressive makes you admire it because it is very good, large, important etc
